title: Text of a Letter to Certain Congressional Committees Regarding a Cyber Policy Report – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
April 19, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1633(a)(2) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115-91), I have enclosed a report regarding the Policy of the United States on Cyberspace, Cybersecurity, and Cyber Warfare.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
